repository.orgName: Staats- und Universitätsbibliothek Hamburg Carl von Ossietzky

msContents.summary: A palm leaf manuscript in two parts, containing the Tāṇḍyabrāhmaṇa (adhyāya 1-25), and the Sāmamantrabrāhmaṇa (prapāṭhaka 1-2).

msItem.title: Tāṇḍyabrāhmaṇa
msItem.rubric: śrīgaṇeśāradāgurubhyo namaḥ | śrīsarasvatyai namaḥ | hariḥ oṃ |
msItem.incipit:
mahan me voco bhargo me voco yaśo me vocaḥ stomaṃ me voco bhuktiṃ mme vocaḥ sarvaṃ me vocas tan māvatu tan māviśatu tena bhukṣiṣīya devo devam etu somas so
mam etv ṛtasya pathā vihāya dauṣkṛtyam badvā nāmāsi sṛtiḥ somasaraṇī somaṃ gameyaṃ pitaro bhūḥ pitaro bhūḥ pitaro bhūr nṛmaṇa ūrdhvabharasaṃ tvordhvabharā dṛśeyam mṛdā śithirā devānāṃ tīrthaṃ vedir asi mā mā hiṃsīḥ viṣṇoś śi
ro si yaśodhā yaśo mai dhehīṣa ūrja āyuṣe varcase ca || 1 ||—||
msItem.explicit:
brahmaṇaḥ salokatā sārṣṭitāṃ sāyujyaṃ gacchanti ya etad upayanti tad etad viśvasṛjāṃ sahasra
saṃvatsaram etena vai prajāpatiḥ sarvām ṛddhim ārdhnuvaṃ sarvām ṛddhim ṛdhnuvanti yā etad upayanti ||—|| 6 ||— ||
msItem.finalRubric:
paṃcapaṃcivatayāṃ paṃcamodhyāyaḥ ||—|| mahābrāhmaṇaḥ samāptaḥ ||—||
yādṛśaṃ pustakaṃ dṛṣṭā tādṛṣaṃ likhitaṃ mayā | apadhaṃ vā supaddhaṃ vā mama doṣo na vidyate | sarabhasakaravegād rakṣa varṇādidoṣo yahi ha bhavati vā tatpustake hastadoṣāt
sakalakalam idaṃ naḥ sadmṛṇe grāhakāmī karakṛtam aparādhaṃ jaṃtu jaṃtu mahiṃ tu saṃtaḥ | śrīveṃkateśāya namaḥ | śrīvedapuruṣāya namaḥ ||—||

msItem.title: Sāmamantrabrāhmaṇa
msItem.incipit:
deva savitaḥ prasuva yajñaṃ prasuva yajñapatiṃ bhagāya divyo gaṃdharvaḥ ketapūḥ ketaṃ naḥ punātu | vācaspatir vācaṃ nas svadatu | kāma veda te nāma mado nāmāsi samānayāmuṃ surā
to abhayaṃ kṛṇotu |
msItem.explicit:
dhehi taṃ jahy amaṣya cobhayo matsṛja gām attu | tṛṇāny attu pibatūdakaṃ mātā rudrāṇāṃ duhitā vasūnāṃ svasādityānām amṛtasya nābhiḥ | pra nu vocaṃ cikituṣe janāya mā
gām anāgām iditiṃ vadhiṣṭa | om utsṛjata ||—|| 14 ||

extent.measure: 2 guard folios inserted at the beginning of the bundle and 2 at the end, 119 numbered folios. After f. 111 there is a folio broken on the left border, without number. Then it continues with f. 112.

supportDesc.condition: The manuscript is uninked. Some folios are slightly damaged at the borders.

listBibl.bibl: Janert, Klaus Ludwig, Poti, N. Narasimhan. 1985. Verzeichnis der orientalischen Handschriften in Deutschland. Band II, 7. Stuttgart: F. Steiner. MS 2272; MS 2274. p. 855.

encodingDesc.p: Spaces between words added where possible.
